name: BuddhistPrayers
0:
”Alexa, open Buddhist Prayers”
”Alexa, ask Buddhist Prayers to pray”
”Alexa, ask Buddhist Prayers for Traditional Buddhist Prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buddhist prayers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sit back, relax, reflect, and self meditate with Buddhist Prayers. Have Alexa be your guide by praying with you or you can just listen while you reflect. You can ask for a prayer based on the list in the description below, or you can ask it to pick a prayer for you.

Listen to all the prayers in two more voices: Brother Andrew, a human male voice, and Sister Megan, a human female voice, from the Premium Subscription.

List of Prayers:

An Invocation of Metta/Compassion
Praise to Buddha Shakyamuni
The Buddha's Words on Kindness (Metta Sutta)
Golden Chain Prayer
Meal Time Prayer
Tibetan Buddhist Meal Time Prayer
Traditional Buddhist Prayer
Bodhisattva Prayer for Humanity
Offering the Mandala
Harmony
Giving to those in Need
Prayer for Youth
Being Peace
With Every Breath
Sky is Free
Walking in Meditation
Enlightenment
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
